column4: how do i install apache 1.3 in ubuntu? i can only find packages pertaining to apache 2.
okay. is there some special reason 1.3 isn't included? i think it's still in pretty widespread use, and there are still new releases.
apache 1.3 is not typical user of ubuntu. you might try debian. or ask in #ubuntu-server if someone has a 1.3 package
